message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm asking for $11,000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion. I am willing to pay $9,500 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I value this product at a higher price point. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,250?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I am willing to pay $10,000 for the product.
